title: Apple's Spring Event! AirTags, M1 iPad, and Colorful iMacs
description:
This week we cover everything that Apple unveiled during their "Spring Loaded" event. From the small announcements like a purple iPhone, new Apple TV 4K, and redesigned Podcasts app, to the bigger hardware announcements like AirTags and the new colorful iMacs, we cover it all. (Spoiler alert: we don't love the new iMac design)
To check out Dr. Squatch, go to https://bit.ly/3dTWS4U and use Promo Code: DSCWAVEFORM to get 20% off on orders of $20 or more!
Don’t forget to subscribe to the podcast for free wherever you're listening, or by using this link: http://bit.ly/WaveformMKBHD
If you like the show, telling a friend about it would be amazing! You can text, email, or Tweet this link to a friend: http://bit.ly/WaveformMKBHD
